Package ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.photo

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64Wrapper
    This class simply acts a simple wrapper around the base64 photo encoded data

    This class is necessary on the for the purposes of data serialization for the dataManager of the Photo it belongs to.
    ImageAdapter
    This custom adapter aids in adding ImageViews to a ListView or GridView with bitmaps applied from the PhotoGallery model.
    ItemPhotoController
    ItemPhotoController is the controller used in editItemView and AddItemView to aid in processing new photos for an item.
    Photo
    Object for the item's photo.
    PhotoGallery
    class PhotoGallery encapsulates a collection of Photos

    This model is used often in the application in such place as EditItemView, AddItemView, InspectItemView, as well as the inventory browse fragments.
    PhotoGalleryController
    Controls the photo gallery for an item.
    PhotoGalleryView
    In this activity the user can view all photos attached to an item, this can be accessed from EditItemView and InspectItemView

    a USER and ITEM uuid are to be passed as extras into this activity
    PhotoUITest
